#include<iostream>
#define INF 1e8
using namespace std;

struct st
{
    int a[4],ans;
    st()
    {
        ans = INF;
    }
}dp[1005];

int coin[4] = {5,3,2,1};

struct st max(struct st x, struct st y)
{
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
    {
        if(x.a[i]>y.a[i])
            return x;
        if(x.a[i]<y.a[i])
            return y;
    }
return x;
}

int main()
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    dp[0].ans = 0;
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
        dp[i].a[i] = 0;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
        for(int j=0;j<4;j++)
        {
            if(i>=coin[j])
            {
                int tmp = dp[i-coin[j]].ans + 1;
                if(tmp < dp[i].ans)
                {
                    dp[i].ans = tmp;
                    for(int k=0;k<4;k++)
                        dp[i].a[k] = dp[i-coin[j]].a[k];
                    dp[i].a[j]++;
                }
                else if(tmp==dp[i].ans)
                    dp[i] = max(dp[i],dp[i-coin[j]]);
            }
        }
    }
    
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
        cout << dp[n].a[i] << endl;
return 0;
}
